Text.Page:
Salutations, .

My name is Amarre, and I'm an expert on ecosystems.

I arrived at the Stronghold of Blood with a request to investigate the butterflies.

I need to go deeper inside, but I'm afraid it's too dangerous by myself.

The Mysterium told me that you'd be willing to help.

Please help me .
Sincerely

- Amarre

With the help of Amarre, returned to the Stronghold of Blood.

The Mysterium Researchers were having difficulties with the recent increase in the number of butterflies, and asked to discover the cause of the increased numbers.

Barurung escorted and Amarre to Elleon, who was struggling to stop the butterflies by himself.

Elleon guided and Amarre to a butterfly nest that he had found. decided to investigate the nest.

Thank you for coming, . As I said in my letter, I'm Amarre, and I'm an expert on ecosystemsâ€”biological systems, and how they interact.

The Mysterium asked me to investigate the regions afflicted by the crystallization disease. Unfortunately, I need to go further in to gather samples and observe the ecosystem, but it would be too dangerous for me alone.

The Mysterium said that you were the best person to ask for help. Will you help me, ?"It's my pleasure."

I haven't been associated with the Mysterium for a while. I did not give up my position as a researcher on the best of terms.

Things must be pretty bad if the Mysterium is asking for my help. Perhaps the researchers who came before can shed some light on this...?

Can you ask Kailey if she has any information?

In the meantime, I need to go check on the researchers, but I'll be back shortly.

Welcome, . I thought Amarre might send you to me. Thank you for helping her.

I'm sorry, but I have to get back to the site. We're trying to find a way to slow down the influx of butterflies.

But we've been documenting everything we've discovered. It's all in the Research Journal there on the desk.

Please take a look.

Stronghold of Blood. Crystallization Research Journal, Entry #7

- Butterflies multiplying at unusual rate. Researcher who went deeper inside stronghold has been injured. Requested Mysterium to send support. Expert help promised.

- Condition of injured researcher getting worse. Initial affected area has spread to the whole arm. Researcher in excruciating pain.

- Pain medications ineffective. Researchers demoralized.

- Butterflies continue to multiply.

Hey, are you ?

Elleon sent me to find you!

He is trying to find out why the butterflies keep multiplying, but he's having a very hard time.

He said he needs you. Get Amarre and come with me.

It's not far to the location.

I heard what that furry messenger said. The butterflies are still multiplying?

Based on what I just saw, if they really are increasing, this land will be completely uninhabitable within a matter of days.

, you should see what I saw.

The amber powder...it's everywhere!

I heard that it's dangerous!

I don't want my fur to get messed up. You go and clear a path through the Mournwings.

I'll stay here and, uh, protect the lady...until it's safe to pass.

I can't believe we made it all the way here! I can't wait to tell my friends!

, there are more butterflies up ahead. A lot of them.

Where could they be coming from...?

We'd better investigate!

I've been waiting for you, .

I needed someone I can trust.

I've been trying to slow down the butterflies, but there seems to be no end to them.

I assume that your companions are here on behalf of the Mysterium?"That's right."

An ecosystem expert? That'll be great help, indeed.

I found something interesting while I was fighting the butterflies. It's the greatest concentration of them I've seen yet.

It seems likely that it's related to their ever-increasing numbers.

I was planning to go inside, but if I didn't make it out, I wanted someone else to know where the entrance was.

Let me show you.

Did you see that?

Some of those butterflies just came out of that opening!

These thorns...they aren't native to the Stronghold of Blood. How did these get here? We need to see if there's more inside.

I was right.

I would go with you but...Jelena isn't here for me and...it's just too dangerous.

I'm sorry. I'll have to explain later.

Barurung, please report what you saw here to Jelena and the federation.

. Amarre. Will you two investigate the opening?

I'll stay here and try to stop any more butterflies from getting out.
